title: Walt Mossberg on Drones, Bubbles and Donald Trump
description: Walt Mossberg, Executive Editor and Columnist at the Verge and Recode, talks to Chuck Todd about how he switched from covering foreign affairs during the end of the Cold War, to consumer technology at the start of the tech boom.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
